sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AISRefQualUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>This class defines the various reference qualifier functions needed in AI Search</description>
        <name>AISRefQualUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AISRefQualUtils = Class.create();
AISRefQualUtils.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},

	//Used by the 'attribute' column of 'ais_datasource_attribute' table
	getRefQualForSourceAttribute: function(sourceTableName) {
		var basicFilter = 'applies_to=0^ORapplies_to=1^EQ';
		if (!GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.glide.ais.external_content'))
			return basicFilter;

		var nonPublicAccessFilter = 'attribute!=allow_public_access';
		var publicAccessFilter = 'attribute=allow_public_access^EQ';

		if (gs.nil(sourceTableName))
			return nonPublicAccessFilter + '^' + basicFilter;

		var isExternal = GlideDBObjectManager.get().isInstanceOf(sourceTableName, 'v_ais_external_search_content');
		if (!isExternal)
			return nonPublicAccessFilter + '^' + basicFilter;

		return 'attribute=user_read_takes_precedence_over_group_deny^OR' + publicAccessFilter;
	},

    type: 'AISRefQualUtils'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2024-01-04 04:35:00</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>6e483b05436331103444f03a5ab8f22d</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AISRefQualUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="AI Search" source="com.glide.ais">eb04fc283c31311068bcf327dfe37f93</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6e483b05436331103444f03a5ab8f22d</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-01-24 23:42:34</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
